https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dpJnTK5s0vQL7mTkcdVSd45DxP8.jpg 80000 Shots is a German film directed by Manfred Walther. It was released in 2002 and had its premiere at the Berlin International Film Festival. In breathtaking speed, 80000 SHOTS is a documentary about the reconstruction of Berlin's Potsdamer Platz. This 53 minutes' film, shot in timelapse between 1990 - 2000 had its premi√®re at the Berlin International Film Festival 2002. 80000 Shots
